0: Man I promise, I'm so self-conscious

2: Rollies and Pasha's done drove me crazy
3: I can't even pronounce nothing, pass that ver-say-see
4: Man I spent four hundred bucks on this
5: Just to be like, nigga you ain't up on this
6: That's why I'm iced out, medallion heavy on the wrist
7: My niggas servin' the checks like the first and fifth-teenth
8: So insecurr, cut that coke 'til it's so unpure
9: We all need furs by December the third
10: Cause you heard, Chicago winters is extra burr
12: Hustlin' to the whole world, never sober
13: Seats in the Rover, soft as sofurrs
14: Ballin so hurr 'till I need a chauffeur
15: Man I promise, she's so self-conscious
16: She has no idea what she's doing in college
17: That major that she majored in don't make no money
18: But she won't drop out, her parents will look at her funny
19: Now, tell me that ain't insecurr
20: The concept of school seems so secure
21: Sophomore, three yurrs, ain't picked a carurr
22: She like, fuck it, I'll just stay down here and do hair
23: Cause that's enough money to buy shorty a few pairs of new Airs
24: Cause her baby-daddy don't really care
25: She's so precious with the peer pressure
26: Couldn't afford a car so she named her daughter Alexis
27: She had hair so long that it looked like weave
28: Then she cut it all off, now she look like Eve
29: And she be dealin' with some issues that you can't believe
30: Single black female addicted to retail, and well
31: It may seems we living the nigga's American dream
32: But the people highest up got the lowest self-esteem
33: The prettiest people do the ugliest things
34: As any means to get that green
35: Cause society done turned us all into fiends
36: For the road to riches and diamond rings
37: And what about the teens moms hearts that broke?
38: Niggas got killed over Starter coats
39: But I can feel why the shorties be mad as shit

47: It seems the sun never shine, that we searchin' for
title: Dreams Come True
